senses.de: To get something, especially by asking for it, buying it, working for it, or producing it from something else.
senses.ex: You'll need to obtain permission from the principal to leave early.

Tips.title: Effort Implied
Tips.description: Using 'obtain' suggests effort went into getting something, more than just receiving it.
Tips.example: She managed to obtain rare stamps for her collection.

Tips.title: Slight Formality
Tips.description: 'Obtain' is slightly formal and may not be common in everyday casual conversations.
Tips.example: To obtain the best results, one must follow the procedures carefully.

Tips.title: Active Process
Tips.description: 'Obtain' often involves an active process like asking or applying, not just finding or seeing.
Tips.example: The journalist went to great lengths to obtain the information.

senses.de: To be prevalent, customary, or in vogue; to hold or have a place or prevalence.
senses.ex: In some parts of the world, certain customs still obtain.

Tips.title: Cultural Context
Tips.description: When 'obtain' refers to customs or behaviors, it means they are widely recognized and practiced.
Tips.example: The ritual of afternoon tea continues to obtain in some British households.

Tips.title: Less Common Usage
Tips.description: This use of 'obtain' is less common and more formal, often found in written or academic contexts.
Tips.example: The same methods of farming still obtain in remote regions.

Tips.title: Prevalence Implied
Tips.description: 'Obtain' in this sense implies that something is not just present but also widespread or established.
Tips.example: Such beliefs no longer broadly obtain in the modern world.

Acquire.wordDefinition:
Both acquire and obtain mean to gain or get something.

However, acquire is used when you gain something that you have worked hard for or made an effort to get. For example, you can acquire knowledge or skills by going to school and studying.

Acquire implies more effort or work put in to gain something, while obtain implies a more routine or easy process of gaining something.

Attain.wordDefinition:
Both attain and obtain mean to acquire or get something, but they are used in slightly different contexts.

Attain, on the other hand, often implies reaching a goal or achieving something through effort or skill. For example, you might attain a high grade in school by studying hard or attain financial success through diligent work.

So, in general, obtain is used when someone acquires something through a process, while attain is used when someone achieves something through effort.

Collect.wordDefinition:
Collect means to gather things together or to accumulate a group of similar or related items over time. It is applicable when talking about physically acquiring items such as stamps or coins, or gathering information or data.

To summarize, collect is typically used when referring to gathering a group of items over time, while obtain is used when referring to acquiring something through deliberate effort or action.

Derive.wordDefinition:
Derive means to obtain something through logical reasoning or by extracting it from a source.

For example, you might derive an equation using mathematical formulas or derive the meaning of a word from the context it's used in.

Derive is used when you're figuring something out or extracting meaning from a source, while obtain is used when you're simply getting something.

Fetch.wordDefinition:
Both fetch and obtain mean to acquire or get something, but fetch usually implies physically going to get something and bringing it back, while obtain can refer to acquiring something in any way, such as receiving it as a gift or purchasing it online.

For example, you would say "can you fetch me a glass of water from the kitchen?" because you're asking someone to physically go and bring the water back to you.

Fetch is often used for physical objects while obtain can refer to more abstract things, like information or permission.

Gain.wordDefinition:
Both gain and obtain refer to acquiring something.

However, gain typically refers to a gradual or long-term increase, such as gaining knowledge or gaining muscle mass through exercise.

Gain is used in a more abstract or ongoing sense, while obtain is used in a more concrete or immediate sense.

Gather.wordDefinition:
Gather means to collect or bring together.

It is usually used when referring to physically getting things or people together in one place. For example, "We need to gather firewood for the campfire.".

Gather is used when talking about physically collecting things, while obtain is used when referring to acquiring something that might not already be accessible.

Procure.wordDefinition:
Both obtain and procure mean to acquire or get something, but there are some differences in their usage.

Procure has a more specific connotation. It means to obtain something through special means or effort, especially if it's difficult or illegal.

For example, you might procure rare or hard-to-find items, or procure something that is not allowed by law.

Receive.wordDefinition:
Obtain and receive are both verbs that indicate getting something. The main difference is in how the thing is acquired.

Receive refers to getting something without necessarily seeking it actively.

It can be used when you're given something, or when something is delivered or sent to you. For example, you might receive a birthday gift in the mail or receive an email from a friend.

In general, it's better to use receive when talking about something that's given to you, and obtain when you need to put in some effort to get it.

Secure.wordDefinition:
Obtain means to get or acquire something, while the word secure means to ensure safety or protect something.

For example, you can obtain a new phone by buying it from a store or ordering it online, but you can secure your phone by setting a passcode or putting it in a safe place.

Obtain is used when talking about getting something, while secure is used when talking about protecting something.

quotes.Text: The broken heart on my right finger represents me before I figured out who I was, and the full heart on my left is because I'm left-handed, I use that to write my music, and my music helped me obtain my direction in life.
quotes.Title: English Musician
quotes.Name: Yungblud

quotes.Text: I really find comfort in watching film and obtaining knowledge and I use statistics and computer generated stuff to help me get those stats. That was probably a result of my father's influence on me at a young age.
quotes.Title: American Coach
quotes.Name: Erik Spoelstra

quotes.Text: A truer image of the world, I think, is obtained by picturing things as entering into the stream of time from an eternal world outside, than from a view which regards time as the devouring tyrant of all that is.
quotes.Title: British Philosopher
quotes.Name: Bertrand Russell

quotes.Text: Individuals with kidney disease who are able to obtain treatment early experience a higher quality of life and are able to maintain more of their day-to-day activities, including keeping their jobs.
quotes.Title: American Politician
quotes.Name: Xavier Becerra

quotes.Text: Expanding background checks will help create a uniform standard for all gun purchases and prevent criminals and the dangerously mentally ill from obtaining powerful weapons.
quotes.Title: American Politician
quotes.Name: Gabrielle Giffords

quotes.Text: Truth, like gold, is to be obtained not by its growth, but by washing away from it all that is not gold.
quotes.Title: Russian Novelist
quotes.Name: Leo Tolstoy

quotes.Text: We can never obtain peace in the outer world until we make peace with ourselves.
quotes.Title: Tibetan Leader
quotes.Name: Dalai Lama

quotes.Text: Where the people possess no authority, their rights obtain no respect.
quotes.Title: American Historian
quotes.Name: George Bancroft

quotes.Text: That which we obtain too easily, we esteem too lightly.
quotes.Title: English Activist
quotes.Name: Thomas Paine
